website_summaries.verdict: The KEEN Clearwater CNX is a reasonably priced sandal that provides stability, comfort, and ample traction. Users admire the shoe for being lightweight and versatile for various activities. The thin PU midsole lets users have a good feel of the ground. The toe protection and traction of the sandal in various ground conditions are exceptional.Buyers are, however, disappointed with a few mishaps. Overall, its benefits overshadow its disadvantages.
pros: The KEEN Clearwater CNX withstands everything from hiking, biking, walking to boating, a couple of users have commented
A good number of testers approve of its stability when they have tried using the pair across uneven grounds
A favorite feature of the majority is that this KEEN sandal is washable
Numerous shoppers have noted that they got their money’s worth on this Keen sandal
The minimalist feeling when wearing the sandals is praised by some of the testers
The rubber toe rand gives excellent protection, several wearers have remarked
Some hiking enthusiasts are delighted about its traction which was tested in various ground conditions
A majority of users admire the comfort they have received from the KEEN Clearwater CNX sandal
cons: A group of testers with high-arched feet walked for miles and found out that the arch support is lacking, an expert reviewer reports
A small number of disappointed consumers have width issues, noting that the sandals are too narrow for them
A couple of wearers do not like that the stitching fell apart quickly

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals comfortable and smart.
customer_reviews.text: I chose these because my wife has had a pair for a year and loves them. Comfortable straight out of the box. 5 mile walk with no rubs or catches. I was a little concerned what size to choose based on other reviews. Size purchased great for me. I ordered 8.5. I have size 8 every day shoes and 9 walking boots the in-between size worked for me. They look good and seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: ceegee

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good fit..
customer_reviews.text: I’ve looked at these sandals for a good while and seen them in use in several countries on expeditions. They are well made and very comfortable. I went by the European Size on all of my other footwear and they fit perfectly. The main thing that I like, is that they have a protected toe area, useful for wading rivers that might have hidden obstacles (I had a client in Morocco who got a piece of steel wire stuck in his big toe when crossing a river in the mountains). At this price, a must have outdoor item...
customer_reviews.author: Robupnorth

customer_reviews.title: Sizing wasn’t even close! Wasted time and energy.
customer_reviews.text: There is a massive problem with the sizing. I read the reviews and took a risk. The EU size 45’s UK 10.5 arrived and were labelled in the tongue to say this but they were clearly more like an 8. Massively disappointed as I have owned many keens and the size has always been spot on. I can only assume this is a faulty batch and amazon need to change the listing to advise on what to order... in my case I think I would have needed a 13!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. C. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Comfy good walking sandal
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as I have a pair of the Whisper and they are so comfy and good for walking, especially on the beach which we do a lot. I got him a half a size bigger after reading previous reviews and they fit him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: DillyDot

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are too small
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted they are on the small size, I needed 10.5 rather than 9.5, even then tight to get on, thankfully Amazon returns came to the rescue and the new larger size fits perfectly once on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: C Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Live up to the KEEN product line, best wide fit shoe manufacture I have come across.
customer_reviews.text: Longer than expecting however not sure I would have got my foot through the non adjustable ankle "loop" on a smaller size. Used allot and no signs of wear or failure of any stitching or parts.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Not for walking
customer_reviews.text: Okay for strolling around but not supportive enough for walking over uneven surface
customer_reviews.author: paul fathers

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and rugged
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and comfortable though I haven’t yet tried them in the wet.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes bought for a summer trip to Disney world Florida! Usually a 9 1/2 but bought one half size bigger as correctly suggested by others. Comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: P COOK

customer_reviews.title: High quality feel
customer_reviews.text: High quality sandal, cushioned sole, fairly simple to take off or pull on and tighten up. I bought size UK8 because I won’t wear socks with these. They fit well and normally I buy a UK7.5 for standard shoes. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Considering how much I hate the idea of sandals, these are awesome
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandal.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, very comfortable. Perfect for active beach wera and hot weather travel. Expensive but look to be very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Welshbud

customer_reviews.title: I am an 8. Told to get a 9 ...
customer_reviews.text: I am an 8. Told to get a 9. Little bit big in length but nothing to worry about but width is spot on. Any smaller and they would be tight
customer_reviews.author: lv426

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, comfortable from the outset. Size stated was accurate. Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: C Wheel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable and light to wear and will be bought again if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Serious size problems.
customer_reviews.text: Serious size problems.Much smaller than expected.Check Keen site for size with real length data.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight comfortable and trendy
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for father's day. Lightweight comfortable and trendy!
customer_reviews.author: Ms S

customer_reviews.title: Only issue I have is that plastic inners do get ...
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I have is that plastic inners do get stinky very quickly. Otherwise very comfy shoes for my teenage boy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tarrant

customer_reviews.title: Great set of sandals
customer_reviews.text: Great set of sandals, i uses them day to day working round water over the summer and so have i have found them very sturdy and comfortable. As a not i do find that they are quite a wide fit.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander  Ward

customer_reviews.title: Was at least 1 size too small
customer_reviews.text: Was at least 1 size too small, said "9" on the label, but nearer to a 8 (couldn't even get them on my feet) sadly I had to pay for the postage back :-(((((
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: HOPING THAT I WILL EVENTUALLY GET THE SHOES 1/2 A SIZE SMALLER AS PER TELEPHONE CALL WITH SUPPLIER
customer_reviews.text: Asked for replacement. However due to capital control in Greece we do not know how things will develop.
customer_reviews.author: MARIE-JEANNE DEPIAN

customer_reviews.title: No good for water work- retain las water and  hurt regular feet
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Product is bad for water- after getting wet I walked for 30 mins.. my feet were in agony because the material absorbs and retain water and then holds it against your skin whilst rubbing. I bought these for the beach and crossing rivers. They also collect small stones easily which get trapped. Waste of £60, Better to buy £10 pair from Tesco.
customer_reviews.author: Mr anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Prefer inov8
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to be objective here as I wanted a pair if inov8 to replace the ones I have which in my opinion are superior to the Keens but unable to do so, I tried these. They are good quality and probably better in wet than inov8 but not as comfortable and not as good to walk in and I prefer the inov8 so one star lost there. Second star is down to the price. I think the Keens are too expensive. Those things apart, these are good sandals for active wear and I am not rubbishing them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Colin Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Need a prefect pair of Sandals?
customer_reviews.text: Needed a comfortable pair of Sandals (who wouldn't) that would also protect my toes against rough terrain and not be destroyed when walking through water. These were brilliant. Walked through water, sand, over rocks and I'm still using them around town in hot weather. They've kept their look - still as good as new - better than any other Sandals I've purchased in the past. Would definately recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Canonlens

customer_reviews.title: 5 Keen sandals for many years which have given good service, just got these new ones in size ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had a size 9.5 Keen sandals for many years which have given good service, just got these new ones in size 10. They are a smaller design then the old ones and a bit tighter to get on but the fit is ok. Still like the design and toe protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Like me I guess a lot of people buy keen shoes because of their wide toe box. These are very narrow & different to any other keen shoes I have had. Had to return them. Only suitable for narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Hill

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if too large or not, slight rubbing on small toe, but cured by tightening up a bit. I'm a 10.5 UK.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Byron D. Nilsson

customer_reviews.title: Look no Further
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and fit. Spent all my time in Cuba wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: bripht

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A comfortable sandal, fitting well in my usual size and giving good walking protection.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Long and thin, not very wide. Not as robust as earlier versions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size not as described certainly would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow. Size not as described certainly would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Edseabourne

customer_reviews.title: bought a size 10. doesnt fit, far too ...
customer_reviews.text: bought a size 10. doesnt fit, far too small so gave them to my mum whos a size 8.
customer_reviews.author: R. Boreham

customer_reviews.title: What the.......?
customer_reviews.text: £184 for a pair of sandals? Is someone taking the pee?
customer_reviews.author: Noggin

product_meta.title: KEEN Men's Clearwater CNX M Sandals
product_meta.description: Get flexibility, fit and protection in a lightweight sandal, designed to make every step a natural connection. Bungee lacing allows a customized fit, and a contoured arch cradles and supports the foot.
